languages.text: Офицер-пустотнорожденный вновь оказывается перед Лорд-капитаном: "Что бы нас ни атаковало, у нас есть запасной путь, как преодолеть вокс-заслон! Докладываю, что в атриуме перед мостиком есть терминал изолированной системы, которая еще может быть не затро..."

traits.locale_text: Офицер-пустотник вновь оказывается перед Лорд-капитаном: "Что бы нас ни атаковало, у нас есть запасной путь, как преодолеть вокс-заслон! Докладываю, что в атриуме перед мостиком есть терминал изолированной системы, которая еще может быть не затро..."

languages.text: The voidborn officer appears before the Lord Captain once more. "Whatever it is that's attacking us, we have a backup procedure that can circumvent the vox-barrier! In the atrium leading to the bridge, there is a terminal for an isolated system that might still be unaffe—"
languages.original_text: Офицер-пустотнорожденный вновь оказывается перед Лорд-капитаном: "Что бы нас ни атаковало, у нас есть запасной путь, как преодолеть вокс-заслон! Докладываю, что в атриуме перед мостиком есть терминал изолированной системы, которая еще может быть не затро..."

traits.locale_text: The voidborn officer appears before the Lord Captain once more. "Whatever it is that's attacking us, we have a backup procedure that can get around the vox-barrier! Reporting: in the atrium leading to the bridge, there is a terminal for an isolated system that might still be unaffe—"

The voidborn officer appears before the Lord Captain once more. "Whatever it is that's attacking us, we have a backup procedure that can get around the vox-barrier! Reporting: in the atrium leading to the bridge, there is a terminal for an isolated system that might still be unaffe—"

The voidborn officer appears before the Lord Captain once more. "Whatever it is that's attacking us, we have a backup procedure that can circumvent the vox-barrier! In the atrium leading to the bridge, there is a terminal for an isolated system that might still be unaffe—"

The voidborn officer appears before the Lord Captain once more. "Whatever it is that's attacking us, we have a backup procedure that can circumvent the vox-barrier! In the atrium leading to the bridge, there is a terminal for an isolated system that might still be unaffe—"

The voidborn officer appears before the Lord Captain once more. "Whatever it is that's attacking us, we have a backup procedure that can circumvent the vox-barrier! In the atrium leading to the bridge, there is a terminal for an isolated system that might still be unaffe—"

languages.text: El oficial nacido del vacío vuelve a presentarse ante {mf|el|la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}. «Independientemente de lo que nos ataque, ¡tenemos un procedimiento de seguridad para superar la barrera de vocos! En el atrio que conduce al puente está el terminal de un sistema aislado que podría haberse libra...».
languages.original_text: The voidborn officer appears before the Lord Captain once more. "Whatever it is that's attacking us, we have a backup procedure that can circumvent the vox-barrier! In the atrium leading to the bridge, there is a terminal for an isolated system that might still be unaffe—"

traits.locale_text: El oficial nacido del vacío vuelve a presentarse ante {mf|el|la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}. «Independientemente de lo que nos ataque, ¡tenemos un procedimiento de seguridad para superar la barrera de vocos! En el atrio que conduce al puente está el terminal de un sistema aislado que podría haberse libra...».

languages.text: 这位虚空之子军官的身影，再次出现在了领主舰长面前。“虽然不知道是什么东西在袭击我们，但我们有个备份程序，可以绕过音阵屏障！通往舰桥的中庭那边有个终端，它的系统和其他系统是分开的，说不定它还没——”
languages.original_text: The voidborn officer appears before the Lord Captain once more. "Whatever it is that's attacking us, we have a backup procedure that can circumvent the vox-barrier! In the atrium leading to the bridge, there is a terminal for an isolated system that might still be unaffe—"

traits.locale_text: 这位虚空之子军官的身影，再次出现在了领主舰长面前。“虽然不知道是什么东西在袭击我们，但我们有个备份程序，可以绕过音阵屏障！通往舰桥的中庭那边有个终端，它的系统和其他系统是分开的，说不定它还没——”

languages.text: 虚空生まれの士官が再びロード・キャプテンの前に現れた。「攻撃の犯人が何であれ、私たちにはヴォクスバリアを回避できるバックアップ手順があります！ブリッジへと続くアトリウムには、孤立したシステムの端末があるのですが、まだ影響を受けて…」
languages.original_text: The voidborn officer appears before the Lord Captain once more. "Whatever it is that's attacking us, we have a backup procedure that can circumvent the vox-barrier! In the atrium leading to the bridge, there is a terminal for an isolated system that might still be unaffe—"

traits.locale_text: 虚空生まれの士官が再びロード・キャプテンの前に現れた。「攻撃の犯人が何であれ、私たちにはヴォクスバリアを回避できるバックアップ手順があります！ブリッジへと続くアトリウムには、孤立したシステムの端末があるのですが、まだ影響を受けて…」

languages.text: Der leergeborene Offizier erscheint erneut vor dem Lord Captain. "Was auch immer es ist, das uns angreift, wir haben ein Notverfahren, das die Vox-Barriere umgehen kann! Im Atrium, das zur Brücke führt, gibt es ein Terminal für ein isoliertes System, das vielleicht noch betroffe..."
languages.original_text: The voidborn officer appears before the Lord Captain once more. "Whatever it is that's attacking us, we have a backup procedure that can circumvent the vox-barrier! In the atrium leading to the bridge, there is a terminal for an isolated system that might still be unaffe—"

languages.text: L'officier hors-monde se présente à nouveau devant {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}. « Quelle que soit l'origine de l'attaque, nous avons une procédure de secours capable de contourner la barrière-vox ! Dans l'atrium menant au pont se trouve le terminal d'un système isolé qui n'a peut-être pas encore été inf... »
languages.original_text: The voidborn officer appears before the Lord Captain once more. "Whatever it is that's attacking us, we have a backup procedure that can circumvent the vox-barrier! In the atrium leading to the bridge, there is a terminal for an isolated system that might still be unaffe—"

traits.locale_text: L'officier hors-monde se présente à nouveau devant {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}. « Quelle que soit l'origine de l'attaque, nous avons une procédure de secours capable de contourner la barrière-vox ! Dans l'atrium menant au pont se trouve le terminal d'un système isolé qui n'a peut-être pas encore été inf... »

languages.text: Uçsuzdoğan subay bir kez daha Lord Kaptan'ın huzuruna çıkıyor. "Bize saldırandan bağımsız olarak voks engelini aşabilecek yedek bir prosedürümüz var! Köprüye giden atriyumda, izole bir sisteme ait bir terminal var. Etkilenmemiş ol..."
languages.original_text: The voidborn officer appears before the Lord Captain once more. "Whatever it is that's attacking us, we have a backup procedure that can circumvent the vox-barrier! In the atrium leading to the bridge, there is a terminal for an isolated system that might still be unaffe—"

traits.locale_text: Uçsuzdoğan subay bir kez daha Lord Kaptan'ın huzuruna çıkıyor. "Bize saldırandan bağımsız olarak voks engelini aşabilecek yedek bir prosedürümüz var! Köprüye giden atriyumda, izole bir sisteme ait bir terminal var. Etkilenmemiş ol..."
